definition: an irritating cutaneous sensation that produces a desire to scratch, have a strong desire or urge to do something
details:
noun
- an irritating cutaneous sensation that produces a desire to scratch
= synonyms: itchiness, itching
- a strong restless desire
= synonyms: urge
- a contagious skin infection caused by the itch mite
= example: a contagious skin infection caused by the itch mite
= synonyms: scabies
verb
- have a strong desire or urge to do something
= example: have a strong desire or urge to do something
= synonyms: spoil
- scrape or rub as if to relieve itching
= synonyms: rub
- have or perceive an itch
= example: have or perceive an itch
- cause to perceive an itch
= example: cause to perceive an itch
